targetNamespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:GetSupportedServiceContracts:1:rivtabp21"> <xs:import schemaLocation="GetSupportedServiceContractsResponder_1.0.xsd" namespace="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:1"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetSupportedServiceContractsRequest"> <wsdl:part name="LogicalAddress" element="riv:LogicalAddress"> <wsdl:documentation>The organisation number of the receiving organisation.</wsdl:documentation> </wsdl:part> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tjsr:GetSupportedServiceContracts"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetSupportedServiceContractsResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tjsr:GetSupportedServiceContractsResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType message="tns:GetSupportedServiceContractsResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="GetSupportedServiceContractsResponderBinding" type="tns:GetSupportedServiceContractsResponderInterface"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetSupportedServiceContracts"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:riv:itintegration:registry:GetSupportedServiceContractsResponder:1:GetSupportedServiceContracts" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:header use="literal" message="tns:GetSupportedServiceContractsRequest" part="LogicalAddress"/> <soap:body use="literal" parts="parameters"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="GetSupportedServiceContractsResponderService"> <wsdl:port name="GetSupportedServiceContractsResponderPort" binding="tns:GetSupportedServiceContractsResponderBinding"> <soap:address location="http://tempuri.org"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

Superseeds wsa:To as type for logical address header in RIVTA 2.1.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceContractNamespaceType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type which describes a service contract.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ServiceContractNamespace" type="xs:anyURI"/> <xs:any namespace="##other" processContents="lax" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="HsaIdType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

Revisioner: Tjänstedomän: itintegration:registry Tjänsteinteraktionstyp: Fråga-Svar WS-profil: RIVTABP21 Förvaltas av: Sveriges Kommuner och Landsting</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <wsdl:types> schemaLocation="../../core_components/itintegration_registry_2.0.xsd" namespace="urn:riv:infrastructure:itintegration:registry:2"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContractRequest"> <wsdl:part name="LogicalAddress" element="itr:LogicalAddress"> <wsdl:documentation>The hsaid of the organisation owning the repository to be queried.</wsdl:documentation> </wsdl:part> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tjsr:GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContract"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContractResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tjsr:GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContractResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType use="literal" message="tns:GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContractRequest" part="LogicalAddress"/> <soap:body use="literal" parts="parameters"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContractResponderService"> <wsdl:port name="GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContractResponderPort" binding="tns:GetLogicalAddresseesByServiceContractResponderBinding"> <soap:address location="http://tempuri.org"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:configuration.scriptText:
import se.skl.rivta.tksupport.soapui.ContentAssertions def ca = new ContentAssertions(context, messageExchange, log) ca.assertNonEmptyResponse()
messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("ContentSize",ca.getContentRecords().size.toString())

import se.skl.rivta.tksupport.soapui.ContentAssertions def ca = new ContentAssertions(context, messageExchange, log) ca.assertNonEmptyResponse()
log.info(ca.getContentRecords().size)
